attributes.action: The People want a General Election, to hold the Government to account
attributes.background: We want Parliament to hold an early election so the people can hold the Prime Minister and His Government to account. The activities that took place at the heart of Government was a horrific revelation. Those at the top of Government must either resign or allow the public to have an election

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Call for an early General Election for 2022
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033
